entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets near midnight then to periods of light snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain and thundershowers this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
